modName: RZ ENB HD - Realistic Fantasy Preset
summary:
Do you like modern game graphical visuals like in UE4,Cryengine 4 and Frostbite 3 ? Than this ENB preset is likely for you.
A cinematic realistic ENB preset with NLA support and different effect shaders made on v315 library.
3 Enb presets to choose from.Pretty much stable 60 fps on 1080p.Made with - NLA, Relighting Skyrim and Night Eye p
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][font=Georgia][color=#f1c232]﻿INFORMATION[/color][/font]
[color=#a4c2f4][img]https://i.imgur.com/FlpwTTz.jpg[/img][/color][/size][color=#a4c2f4]
[/color]
[size=4][color=#d5a6bd]I always looked at some ENB's with such big fancy words and descriptions like " Ultra realistic\True next gen graphics\Real atmos" only to see that, those visuals lack those big words.This is understandable as those ENB authors are typically do not have an education in arts and do not know all the nuances of world lighting behavior,that professional schools are teaching.Lucky enough to study in an Academy of Arts and Architecture back in the days,I decided to make my own visual preset, started from learning basics on v119 ENB to this day.
Not gonna use those fancy words , just gonna share what visuals I have achieved with [u]ENB v315[/u][/color][/size]
[font=Georgia][color=#f1c232][size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color][/font]
[size=4][img]https://i.imgur.com/FlpwTTz.jpg[/img]
[/size][size=4][color=#cfe2f3]As a fan of Unreal Engine visuals and beautiful rendering that this engine was capable of.I bring you this HD ENB preset inspired by real world lighting.
I have compiled my own preset, that is similar to modern game engine lighting system.Bringing to life world lighting in my region and a good old fantasy style looks from JRPG. I wanted to make a mix of those 2 in one preset.
My main HD Fantasy preset is using a standard vanilla weather system but I also made other presets based on NLA weather plugin (custom weather params) and some visual variations to choose from.
=============================
[/color][color=#ffff00]+[/color]Information about color calibration [/size][size=5]:[/size]
[size=4]Those presets was made on Nvidia ICC profile : RGB full 4.4.4.  [0 ~255].[/size]
[size=4]Made on color profile : adobe RG[/size][color=#f4f4f4]B[/color][size=4] (1998)  [/size][url=https://pcmonitors.info/articles/using-icc-profiles-in-windows/]INFO[/url][size=4] 
PC def color profile  [/size]sRGB IEC61966-2.1 also can be used 

[color=#ff7700][size=4]Calibrate your device to this[/size][/color][size=3] [url=https://i.ytimg.com/vi/PtTaln28K6Q/maxresdefault.jpg]testchart[/url][color=#dd7e6b]  [/color][color=#ffffff][[/color][color=#f4f4f4]16 black] from 0~20 color range must be visible,same for [235] 231~255 need to be visible.
It will give you more full color potential with black and white gradients.[/color][/size]

[color=#00ffff][size=5]RECOMMENDED MODS![/size][/color]
[size=5]---------------------------------[/size][size=3]
[color=#dd7e6b]MY RIG[/color]
[color=#dd7e6b]i4590 ~ 3.7Ghz[/color]
[color=#dd7e6b]Msi GTX1060 OC 6gb (def profile 1.55Ghz)  with Verdant 1080\60fps outdoors at current ENB config.[/color]
[color=#dd7e6b]Windows 10 1709 fall creators update ( fixed dx9 memory in Skyrim) [/color]
[color=#dd7e6b]Set game settings on Ultra with shadows on High or just use High for a 1080\60fps gameplay.[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Any HD texture packs for Landscape flora,fauna architecture and humans
[/color][/size][size=3][color=#00ff00]You must have it  or it won't be so beautiful and realistic looking in the game !![/color]
[/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220]
[size=3]Verdant[/size][/url][size=4]     grass mod at game settings on Ultra 
Skyrim.ini
[/size][size=3][Grass][/size]
[size=3]iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=13[/size]
[size=3]iMinGrassSize=97

[/size][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80973/]Osmodius Skyrim Texture Pack HD land[/url] ~ HD Textures for environment[/size][size=3]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784/]Rustic Clothing[/url]﻿ ~ HD Textures for clothing
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605?tab=user+files]aMidianBorn  HD armor[/url] ~ HD retextures of Armours
[/size][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92587]Magic & Swords[/url]﻿  ~  JRPG style beautiful ambient music 
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53667]SoS Fair skin male textures[/url]  ~  an overhaul male texture mod for this ENB[/size]


[color=#ffd966][size=5]INSTALLATION Description[/size][/color]
[color=#f4f4f4][img]https://i.imgur.com/FlpwTTz.jpg[/img][/color]
[size=3]~MANUAL ~ 

Remove all other ENB files if you used  ENB before.
Download ENB dll 315 from [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]Here[/url] or  [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/ih9e72s1wpfxno0/enbseries_skyrim_v0315.zip]Mediafire by SK tuner[/url]﻿ - paste only [u]dll[/u] and [u]exe files[/u] from Wrapper folder to Skyrim directory[color=#93c47d] Steam/Steamapps/common/Skyrim[/color][/size]
[size=3]Paste my files from downloaded presets of your choosing.
[/size]
[size=4][color=#ffff00]!!![/color] Windows 10 v1709 -1803  or below read [color=#ffff00]!!!
[/color][/size]
[size=3]Download [url=http://enbdev.com/download_vramsizetest.htm]VRamSize[/url]﻿ and run dx9 exe. Open [color=#b6d7a8]enblocal.ini[/color] with notepad go to [MEMORY] tab and write  your available memory from dx9 to VideoMemorySizeMb=?[/size]

[size=4]~How to install another preset ?~
[/size][size=3]Drop main HD ENB , you want to try another ?  > drop preset 2 [overwrite] >  or 3 > or main again[/size]

[color=#b6d7a8][size=4]enblocal.ini information for users :
[/size][/color][size=3][color=#ffe599][MEMORY]
[u]Expand[/u]SystemMemoryX64=true [i]< If you have 32 bit Windows, set it to "false".[/i]
[u]Reduce[/u]SystemMemoryUsage=true [i]< enables the ENBoost features to dramatically reduce CTDs.[/i]
[u]Disable[/u]DriverMemoryManager=false [i]< true for AMD users experiencing CTDs even while ENBoost features are enabled.[/i]
[u]Disable[/u]PreloadToVRAM=false [i]< enabling could potentially help to load a save game which fails to load otherwise but may cause stuttering.[/i]
[u]Enable[/u]UnsafeMemoryHacks=false [i]< enabling this is generally not safe, but it's a workaround for users experiencing large amount of stuttering.[/i]
[u]Reserved[/u]MemorySizeMb=??  [i]< start with 64, increase in increments of 128 ( 256, 384, 512, ..., 1024 ) until stuttering has ceased.Only use >=512 with at least 2-3Gb VRAM.[/i]
[u]Video[/u]MemorySizeMb=?? [i]<  RAM + VRAM - 2048 (1Gb=1024) if your RAM < 8Gb. If you have RAM bigger or equal to 8Gb (8192Mb) use (Total Available Video/Graphics Memory - [170 (for win7) or 350 (for win8/10)]).[/i]
[u]Enable[/u]Compression=false [i]< deactivating compression can reduce stuttering, but at the cost of more RAM usage.It's generally recommended to be disabled on systems with more than 2Gb VRAM.[/i]
[/color][list]
[color=#ffe599][i][/i][/color][/list][color=#ffe599][u]Autodetect[/u]VideoMemorySize=false [/color][i][color=#ffe599]<  Because it keeps guessing wrong.[/color][/i]
[i]
[color=#f4f4f4]By default Enblocal.ini have this disabled effects in [u]my[/u] settings
[/color][/i]--------------------------------
[u][FIX][/u]
[i][color=#f4f4f4]FixParallaxBugs=false     [parallax mods][/color][color=#ff00ff]*[/color][/i]
[i]FixParallaxTerrain=false  [parallax mods][i][color=#ff00ff]*[/color][/i][/i]
[color=#f4f4f4][i][color=#ff00ff]*[/color][/i][Some authors of environment textures doesn't know that there are alpha blending mask in alpha channels for those landscape textures.Alphas are used for blending the ground junction with another ground texture.Paste height maps to everything, right ? ][/color]

[i]FixTintGamma=false [/i][color=#f4f4f4]  [ face detail maps with wrong colors\ neck & body color fixed ] [/color]
[u][ENGINE][/u]
[i]EnableVSync=false      [/i][color=#f4f4f4][ im using EnableFPSLimit=60 ,I see no ST but you can turn it on ][/color][/size]
----------------------------------
[size=3]Download and install latest [/size][size=4][url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]Particle patch[/url]﻿ [/size][size=3][color=#6d9eeb]all in one[/color] and SS Scattering by [/size][size=3][b]mindflux [/b]if you install ENB for the first time[/size]
[font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4]
[size=3]go to[/size][/color][/font][size=3] [color=#ffff00]Documents/My Games/Skyrim[/color][b] SkyrimPerf.ini and set this values :[/b][/size]
[size=3]
[Display][b]
[/b]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 [b]
[/b]bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1 [b]
[/b][/size][size=3]bShadowsOnGrass=1

[/size][color=#ff0000][size=4]UNINSTALLATION[/size][/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]----------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[size=3]enbseries folder[/size]
[size=3]file names  with "enb" words in them[/size]
[size=3]effect.txt[/size]
[size=3]Natural Lighting and Atmospherics.esp[/size]
[size=3]RelightingSkyrim-NoScripts.esp
EnhancedENBNightEye.esp[/size][size=3]
[/size]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#ffd966][size=4]In game ENB UI Key CONTROLS[/size]
[/color][size=3]
[color=#ffd966]~ ENB mode on\off
Home 
---------------------------
~ ENB UI on\off
End
---------------------------
~ DOF on\off 
Page Down
---------------------------
~ FPS counter
Page Up[/color]
[/size]
[size=5]ENB Features[/size]
[color=#f4f4f4][img]https://i.imgur.com/FlpwTTz.jpg[/img][/color]
[size=3]Effects :
Bloom shader 2fps ~ works on light sources.Best for dark scenes with fires.    
Lens shader 2fps ~ works on light sources with own custom dirt mask simulating glare effect.
[u]Have a weather lens effect variation in NLA vanilla preset.[/u]
Depth of Feld shader 6-8fps ~ Cinematic DOF effect, makes the scene CG quality render with proper light sources.
Off by default,used for front scenes  best at FOV 40~60.
Effectprepass 6-8fps ~ inverted dof, used for distant shots and blurs front scene.  
[/size][size=3]Sunsprite shader 3fps ~ sun sprite lens glare effect works with Procedural Sun effect.
[/size][size=3]SSAO 8fps ~ normal setting for a quality shadowing in the scene,by def its on.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#b6d7a8]switched on effects by default in Enbseries.ini for 1080\60fps[/color]
EnablePrepass=false
EnableBloom=true
EnableLens=true
EnableAdaptation=false
EnableDepthOfField=false
EnableDetailedShadow=true
EnableAmbientOcclusion=true
EnableImageBasedLighting=true
EnableReflection=false
EnableSunRays=true
EnableSunGlare=true
EnableSoftParticles=false
EnableParticleLights=true
EnableSubSurfaceScattering=true
EnableWater=true
EnableUnderwater=true
EnableVolumetricRays=true
EnableProceduralSun=true
EnableMist=false
EnableSkyLighting=true
EnableCloudShadows=false
[/size]
[size=4]COMPATIBILITY[/size][img]https://i.imgur.com/FlpwTTz.jpg[/img]
[size=3]Lanterns Of Skyrim all in 1
Made with Relighting Skyrim  plugin (not essential)
Not compatible with other weather modifications [/size][color=#ffe599][size=4]
[/size][/color][color=#ffe599][size=4]See comment section for minor troubleshoots.
[/size][/color][color=#ff7700][size=4]If you like it - Endorse[/size][/color]
author: RomeoZero
